conditions_text_1: The stock displayed on our website is indicative and not guaranteed.
conditions_text_2: We strive to keep information up to date, but errors may occur, especially due to returns of equipment or repair delays.
conditions_text_3: After confirming your order, we will confirm its availability within 48 hours. If a product is out of stock, we will offer you an alternative or proceed with the cancellation, with your consent.
conditions_text_4: Required documents: A valid ID and proof of address less than 2 months old are mandatory. Without these documents, the rental will be refused.
Garantie financi√®re : Une caution peut: Financial Guarantee: A deposit may be required, paid through bank authorization via the Wikli platform.
Mat√©riel de haute valeur : Pour une val: High-Value Equipment: For equipment worth over ‚Ç¨2,500, two IDs are required.
Retour et restitution : Si le mat√©riel: Return and Refund: If the equipment is returned in good condition, the deposit will be refunded immediately (95% of the cases). In case of damage, an assessment within 48 hours will determine the necessary repairs.
R√©parations : Vous pouvez confier les r: Repairs: You can entrust the repairs to Guy Location Events or choose a provider within 5 days. Please note, if repairs take 5 days, the equipment will be charged for 5 days of rental.
Rental durations are specified in the co: Rental durations are specified in the contract. Any delay in returning the equipment will be charged at the rate of an additional day for each day of delay.
We guarantee the proper functioning of t: We guarantee the proper functioning of the equipment. If needed, after-sales service is available in the √éle-de-France area within 4 hours. It is recommended to install the equipment at least 4 hours before use to allow for intervention in case of failure.
If the visit was due to improper install: If the visit was due to improper installation or use of the equipment, a fee of ‚Ç¨90.00 (VAT included) will be charged.
Guy Location Events ensures that all the: Guy Location Events ensures that all the equipment provided to you is carefully inspected and maintained in accordance with current safety standards. If there is an issue with any device during the service, and the tenant has not made any improper use, the rental fee for the affected equipment will be fully refunded.
Installations made by the tenant, which: Installations made by the tenant, which are not supervised by professionals, should be carried out carefully and placed away from walkways. The tenant has the option to verify the condition of the equipment in their presence before taking charge. If this verification is not performed, the acceptance of the general rental conditions by the tenant will be considered as recognition of the guarantees offered by Guy Location Events, to prevent any risk of structure falls or damage.
The equipment cannot be subleased or tra: The equipment cannot be subleased or transferred without our written consent. It must not be used for illegal purposes or contrary to good morals, nor outdoors without authorization from the competent authorities.
The rental will be carried out at the ra: The rental will be carried out at the rate indicated on the Guy Location Events website at the time of booking. Prices may change without notice. An invoice will be issued once your reservation is confirmed. If the prices are adjusted after the invoice is issued, the invoice will not be modified retroactively.
Any cancellation made more than 72 hours: Any cancellation made more than 72 hours before the start of the rental will incur a cancellation fee equal to 40% of the total rental amount.
We cannot be held responsible for delays: We cannot be held responsible for delays or cancellations due to unforeseen events such as strikes or natural disasters. A reimbursement or rescheduling solution may be considered based on the situation analysis.
The tenant is responsible for any loss o: The tenant is responsible for any loss or theft of the equipment. They must reimburse the replacement value, based on the current catalog price.
It is the tenant‚Äôs responsibility to o: It is the tenant‚Äôs responsibility to obtain insurance to cover risks of damage, loss, or theft during the rental period. We disclaim any liability for any damage not covered by this insurance.
The equipment will be inspected upon ret: The equipment will be inspected upon return. Any non-compliance, such as damage or dirt requiring special cleaning, will be charged to the tenant. If a service provider is not chosen within 2 business days, the company will carry out repairs and charge the costs.
In the event of a dispute, we commit to: In the event of a dispute, we commit to finding an amicable solution. If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be taken to the competent court located at our headquarters.
By signing the rental contract, the tena: By signing the rental contract, the tenant acknowledges having read and accepted the general rental conditions without reservation.
